statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: You are given a number of case-sensitive strings of alphabetic characters, find the largest string X, such that either X, or its inverse can be found as a substring of any of the given strings.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line of the input file contains a single integer t (1 <= t <= 10), the number of test cases, followed by the input data for each test case. The first line of each test case contains a single integer n (1 <= n <= 100), the number of given strings, followed by n lines, each representing one string of minimum length 1 and maximum length 100. There is no extra white space before and after a string.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: There should be one line per test case containing the length of the largest string found.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
2
3
ABCD
BCDFF
BRCD
2
rose
orchid
